page.title: 15GASKYNS FARM, SLINFOLD
page.content: Gaskyns Farm is in{Slinfold.}The main crop is{hay}for the livestock. There are about fifty acres of land and the farm house was built in the {fifteenth century.}It is now owned by Colonel Douglas. The main cattle are{Hereford Cross {Sussex cattle.}They are taken to {Guildford market}to be slaughtered. Gaskyns Farm get their cattle from Warnham.They keep Hereford cattle in particular because they are one of the{best beef cattle}you can buy.It is very good meat,and the cattle are mostly fed on hay. Also the owners of the Hereford cattle have two Jersey cows,which are kept for milk to drink for themselves. This year the Hereford cattle produced eight calves,but they lost four.It has been an unsuccessful season in l985.
